CustomField.description: The span after data in Data Clean Object is inserted for masking and/or deletion to initiate the process. Process will be scheduled after the days mentioned in this field via Trigger once the records are successfully inserted in Data Clean Object
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The span after data in Data Clean Object is inserted for masking and/or deletion to initiate the process. Process will be scheduled after the days mentioned in this field via Trigger once the records are successfully inserted in Data Clean Object
CustomField.label: Data Clean Process Start After
